implementation_summary.QUESTION_KEYWORD_PATTERN: Added constant with 17 keywords (7 observed + 10 defensive). ReDoS safe (SEC-S4-002).
implementation_summary.isQuestionLikeLine: Added function with Pattern 1 (? / U+FF1F ending) and Pattern 2 (: ending + keyword). Control character resilient (SEC-S4-004).
implementation_summary.SEC_001b_guard: Refactored Layer 5 SEC-001 into SEC-001a (existing questionEndIndex check) + SEC-001b (new isQuestionLikeLine validation). Applied only when requireDefaultIndicator=false.

regression_verification.issue_161_tests: All existing Issue #161 tests pass (no regression)
regression_verification.issue_193_tests: All existing Issue #193 tests pass (no regression)

commits: 2e4ee97: fix(prompt-detector): add SEC-001b question line validation to prevent numbered list false positives
message: TDD implementation complete. All 126 tests pass (100 existing + 26 new). ESLint 0 errors, TypeScript 0 errors. SEC-001b guard successfully prevents false positive detection of normal numbered lists while preserving Claude Code real prompt detection.
